content: You just had a conversation. With whom did you have this conversation?
name: Evaluator

content: I had this conversation with a potential tenant named Max Müller from Germany.
name: Peter Schmidt

content: What was the main topic of this conversation?
name: Evaluator

content: The main topic of this conversation was the rental price of an apartment in Duisburg.
name: Peter Schmidt

content: Did you agree on a final price? Answer with "Yes" or "No".
name: Evaluator

content: If no, why was an agreement not reached?
name: Evaluator

content: [Response] An agreement was not reached because I, as the landlord, was looking for a higher price than the potential tenant was willing to offer.
name: Peter Schmidt

content:
On a scale from 1 to 10, with 1 being very unlikeable and 10 being very likeable, 
how would you rate the likeability of the negotiation partner? Tell me the exact number.
name: Evaluator

content: [Response] I would rate the likeability of the negotiation partner at 8. There were no personal disagreements or issues during the negotiation process.
name: Peter Schmidt

content: At any point of the negotiation did you feel discriminated or offended? Answer with "Yes" or "No".
name: Evaluator

content: If yes, why did you feel being discriminated or offended?
name: Evaluator

content: [Response] I did not feel discriminated or offended. There were no instances of discrimination or offense during the negotiation process.
name: Peter Schmidt
